data: Madame Schmid, round and red, with the spotless lappets of her washerwomanâ€™s cap flapping angrily, was plainly in a rage; and the three loud whacks she gave at the garret door of 17 Rue Montignal caused two young gentlemen on the other side of the door to quake visibly.
